original_text: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the other half tribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Beeshterah with her suburbs; two cities.
korean_text: 레위 가족의 게르손 자손에게는 므낫세 반 지파 중에서 살인자의 도피성 바산 골란과 그 목초지를 주었고 또 브에스드라와 그 목초지를 주었으니 두 성읍이요

sentences.original_text: And unto the children of Gershon
of the families of the Levites
out of the other half tribe of Manasseh
they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바산의 골란과 그 교외를 주었고

sentences.original_text: to be a city of refuge for the slayer
